entities.description: A close friend of Harry's and a skilled witch.

entities.name: madam pomfrey

entities.name: the sunday prophet
entities.description: A wizarding newspaper that reports on the latest news and events in the wizarding world.

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: A wizarding magazine known for its eccentric and unconventional articles.

relationships.description: Hermione is reading the newspaper to Harry, indicating their close friendship.
Madam Pomfrey healed Ginny's ankle, establishing a relationship between them.
